profile.p: Dev passionate about creating and developing, turning ideas into real things. Always willing to learn, discover and overcome new challenges. With skills in React JS, CSS, Tailwind, Javascript, JAVA. At the moment finalist of the Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering and Telecommunications - ISUTC
